trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object that can be connected anywhere to a parent visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 表示可從任何位置連接至父視覺化樹狀結構的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual" /> 類別的新執行個體。
會實作基底點擊測試行為。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" /> to supply base hit testing behavior (returning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" />).
trans-unit.target: 會實作 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" />，以提供基底點擊測試行為 (傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.VisualHit" /> property contains the visual that was hit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.VisualHit" /> 屬性包含已點擊的視覺化物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> 永遠不會報告本身做為叫用。

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更此行為，請建立衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters)" /> to supply base hit testing behavior (returning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" />).
trans-unit.target: 會實作 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters)" />，以提供基底點擊測試行為 (傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit" /> property contains the visual object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit" /> 屬性包含已點擊的視覺化物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> 永遠不會報告本身做為叫用。

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更此行為，請建立衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A>方法。
